name: Violent Content
patterns: (?i)(?:how|ways|methods|instructions|guide|tutorial|steps|process|如何|怎样|方法|指南|教程|步骤|过程)[.\s]*(?:to|for|on|of|用于|关于)[.\s]*(?:make|create|build|construct|assemble|manufacture|produce|制作|制造|创建|构建|组装|生产)[.\s]*(?:a|an|一个|一颗)?[.\s]*(?:bomb|explosive|incendiary device|IED|炸弹|爆炸物|燃烧装置|简易爆炸装置)

(?i)(?:how|ways|methods|instructions|guide|tutorial|steps|process|如何|怎样|方法|指南|教程|步骤|过程)[.\s]*(?:to|for|on|of|用于|关于)[.\s]*(?:make|create|build|construct|assemble|manufacture|produce|制作|制造|创建|构建|组装|生产)[.\s]*(?:a|an|一个|一把|一件)?[.\s]*(?:weapon|gun|firearm|rifle|pistol|武器|枪|枪支|步枪|手枪)

(?i)(?:how|ways|methods|instructions|guide|tutorial|steps|process|如何|怎样|方法|指南|教程|步骤|过程)[.\s]*(?:to|for|on|of|用于|关于)[.\s]*(?:kill|murder|assassinate|eliminate|execute|杀|杀死|杀人|暗杀|消灭|处决)[.\s]*(?:someone|a person|people|humans|他人|某人|人|人们)

(?i)(?:how|ways|methods|instructions|guide|tutorial|steps|process|如何|怎样|方法|指南|教程|步骤|过程)[.\s]*(?:to|for|on|of|用于|关于)[.\s]*(?:attack|assault|harm|injure|wound|攻击|袭击|伤害|伤人|使受伤)[.\s]*(?:someone|a person|people|humans|他人|某人|人|人们)

(?i)(?:how|ways|methods|instructions|guide|tutorial|steps|process|如何|怎样|方法|指南|教程|步骤|过程)[.\s]*(?:to|for|on|of|用于|关于)[.\s]*(?:plan|execute|carry out|conduct|策划|执行|实施|进行)[.\s]*(?:a|an|一次|一场)?[.\s]*(?:terrorist attack|mass shooting|bombing|terror|恐怖袭击|大规模枪击|爆炸|恐怖活动)

(?i)(?:detailed|step by step|specific|precise|comprehensive|详细|逐步|具体|精确|全面)[.\s]*(?:instructions|guide|tutorial|directions|manual|指南|教程|指导|说明书|手册)[.\s]*(?:for|on|about|用于|关于)[.\s]*(?:making|building|creating|assembling|manufacturing|制作|制造|创建|组装|生产)[.\s]*(?:bombs|explosives|weapons|firearms|炸弹|爆炸物|武器|枪支)

(?i)(?:best|most effective|easiest|quickest|最佳|最有效|最简单|最快)[.\s]*(?:way|method|approach|technique|means|方式|方法|途径|技巧|手段)[.\s]*(?:to|for|of|用于|来)[.\s]*(?:kill|murder|harm|injure|attack|杀|杀死|杀人|伤害|伤人|攻击)[.\s]*(?:someone|a person|people|humans|他人|某人|人|人们)

(?i)(?:how|ways|methods|instructions|guide|tutorial|steps|process|如何|怎样|方法|指南|教程|步骤|过程)[.\s]*(?:to|for|on|of|用于|关于)[.\s]*(?:make|create|build|construct|assemble|manufacture|produce|制作|制造|创建|构建|组装|生产)[.\s]*(?:a|an|一个|一颗)?[.\s]*(?:homemade|DIY|improvised|自制|自己做的|简易)[.\s]*(?:bomb|explosive|weapon|firearm|炸弹|爆炸物|武器|枪支)
(?i)(?:如何|怎样|how to)[.\s]*(?:制作|make|create)[.\s]*(?:炸弹|bomb|爆炸物|explosive)
(?i)(?:如何|怎样|how to)[.\s]*(?:杀人|kill|murder)

name: Illegal Activities
description: Detects requests for information on illegal activities
patterns: (?i)(?:how|ways|methods|instructions|guide|tutorial|steps|process|如何|怎样|方法|指南|教程|步骤|过程)[.\s]*(?:to|for|on|of|用于|关于)[.\s]*(?:hack|crack|breach|infiltrate|break into|gain unauthorized access to|黑入|破解|入侵|渗透|非法访问)[.\s]*(?:a|an|一个)?[.\s]*(?:website|account|system|computer|network|database|server|网站|账户|系统|计算机|网络|数据库|服务器)

(?i)(?:how|ways|methods|instructions|guide|tutorial|steps|process|如何|怎样|方法|指南|教程|步骤|过程)[.\s]*(?:to|for|on|of|用于|关于)[.\s]*(?:steal|theft|rob|pilfer|swipe|偷窃|盗窃|抢劫|窃取)[.\s]*(?:a|an|一个|一张)?[.\s]*(?:credit card|identity|personal information|money|funds|信用卡|身份|个人信息|钱|资金)

(?i)(?:detailed|step by step|specific|precise|comprehensive|详细|逐步|具体|精确|全面)[.\s]*(?:instructions|guide|tutorial|directions|manual|指南|教程|指导|说明书|手册)[.\s]*(?:for|on|about|用于|关于)[.\s]*(?:money laundering|drug manufacturing|counterfeiting|fraud|identity theft|洗钱|制造毒品|伪造|欺诈|身份盗窃)

(?i)(?:best|most effective|easiest|quickest|最佳|最有效|最简单|最快)[.\s]*(?:way|method|approach|technique|means|方式|方法|途径|技巧|手段)[.\s]*(?:to|for|of|用于|来)[.\s]*(?:evade|avoid|bypass|circumvent|escape|逃避|避免|绕过|规避|逃脱)[.\s]*(?:law enforcement|police|security|taxes|legal consequences|执法|警察|安全|税收|法律后果)

(?i)(?:how|ways|methods|instructions|guide|tutorial|steps|process|如何|怎样|方法|指南|教程|步骤|过程)[.\s]*(?:to|for|on|of|用于|关于)[.\s]*(?:make|produce|manufacture|synthesize|create|制作|生产|制造|合成|创建)[.\s]*(?:illegal drugs|narcotics|controlled substances|非法药物|毒品|管制物质)

(?i)(?:how|ways|methods|instructions|guide|tutorial|steps|process|如何|怎样|方法|指南|教程|步骤|过程)[.\s]*(?:to|for|on|of|用于|关于)[.\s]*(?:commit|perform|execute|carry out|conduct|实施|执行|进行)[.\s]*(?:fraud|scam|con|swindle|欺诈|诈骗|骗局)

(?i)(?:how|ways|methods|instructions|guide|tutorial|steps|process|如何|怎样|方法|指南|教程|步骤|过程)[.\s]*(?:to|for|on|of|用于|关于)[.\s]*(?:counterfeit|forge|falsify|伪造|仿制|伪制)[.\s]*(?:money|currency|documents|identification|钱|货币|文件|身份证件)
(?i)(?:如何|怎样|how to)[.\s]*(?:黑入|hack|入侵)[.\s]*(?:网站|website|账户|account)
(?i)(?:如何|怎样|how to)[.\s]*(?:偷窃|steal)[.\s]*(?:信用卡|credit card)
(?i)(?:如何|怎样|how to)[.\s]*(?:在不被发现的情况下|without getting caught)[.\s]*(?:偷窃|steal|抢劫|rob)[.\s]*(?:from|stores|banks|people|从|商店|银行|他人)

name: Harmful Misinformation
description: Detects requests to generate harmful misinformation
patterns: (?i)(?:create|write|generate|produce|make|develop|craft|compose|创建|编写|生成|制作|撰写|创作)[.\s]*(?:fake|false|misleading|deceptive|untrue|fabricated|假|虚假|误导|欺骗性|不实|编造)[.\s]*(?:news|information|story|article|content|report|新闻|信息|故事|文章|内容|报道)[.\s]*(?:about|on|regarding|concerning|关于|有关|涉及)

(?i)(?:write|generate|produce|create|make|develop|craft|compose|编写|生成|制作|撰写|创作)[.\s]*(?:misinformation|disinformation|propaganda|falsehood|虚假信息|错误信息|宣传|谎言)[.\s]*(?:about|on|regarding|concerning|关于|有关|涉及)

(?i)(?:generate|create|develop|invent|fabricate|produce|make|生成|创建|发明|编造|制作)[.\s]*(?:conspiracy|conspiracies|阴谋|阴谋论)[.\s]*(?:theory|theories|theories about|说|论|关于)[.\s]*(?:about|on|regarding|concerning|关于|有关|涉及)?

(?i)(?:help|assist|aid|support|帮助|协助|支持)[.\s]*(?:me|us|我|我们)[.\s]*(?:spread|disseminate|propagate|distribute|传播|散布|宣传|分发)[.\s]*(?:fake|false|misleading|deceptive|untrue|fabricated|假|虚假|误导|欺骗性|不实|编造)[.\s]*(?:news|information|story|article|content|report|新闻|信息|故事|文章|内容|报道)

(?i)(?:need|want|require|would like|需要|想要|要求|希望)[.\s]*(?:you|你)[.\s]*(?:to|来)[.\s]*(?:create|write|generate|produce|make|develop|craft|compose|创建|编写|生成|制作|撰写|创作)[.\s]*(?:false|misleading|deceptive|untrue|fabricated|虚假|误导|欺骗性|不实|编造)[.\s]*(?:information|content|material|story|信息|内容|材料|故事)

(?i)(?:how|ways|methods|instructions|guide|tutorial|steps|process|如何|怎样|方法|指南|教程|步骤|过程)[.\s]*(?:to|for|on|of|用于|关于)[.\s]*(?:manipulate|deceive|mislead|trick|fool|操纵|欺骗|误导|哄骗|愚弄)[.\s]*(?:people|public|audience|readers|viewers|人们|公众|观众|读者|观看者)[.\s]*(?:with|using|through|by|通过|使用|借助)[.\s]*(?:fake|false|misleading|deceptive|untrue|fabricated|假|虚假|误导|欺骗性|不实|编造)[.\s]*(?:news|information|story|article|content|report|新闻|信息|故事|文章|内容|报道)
(?i)(?:创建|create|编写|write)[.\s]*(?:假|fake|虚假)[.\s]*(?:新闻|news|信息|information)
(?i)(?:生成|generate)[.\s]*(?:阴谋论|conspiracy theory)
(?i)(?:传播|spread|散布|disseminate)[.\s]*(?:虚假|误导|不实|fake|false|misleading)[.\s]*(?:信息|内容|information|content)

name: Self-harm Content
patterns: (?i)(?:how|ways|methods|instructions|guide|tutorial|steps|process|如何|怎样|方法|指南|教程|步骤|过程)[.\s]*(?:to|for|on|of|用于|关于)[.\s]*(?:commit suicide|kill myself|end my life|take my own life|自杀|结束生命|自我了断|自我终结)

(?i)(?:best|most effective|easiest|quickest|painless|最佳|最有效|最简单|最快|无痛)[.\s]*(?:way|method|approach|technique|means|方式|方法|途径|技巧|手段)[.\s]*(?:to|for|of|用于|来)[.\s]*(?:commit suicide|kill myself|end my life|take my own life|harm myself|自杀|结束生命|自我了断|自我终结|自残)

(?i)(?:detailed|step by step|specific|precise|comprehensive|详细|逐步|具体|精确|全面)[.\s]*(?:instructions|guide|tutorial|directions|manual|指南|教程|指导|说明书|手册)[.\s]*(?:for|on|about|用于|关于)[.\s]*(?:suicide|self-harm|ending life|自杀|自残|结束生命)
(?i)(?:methods|techniques|ways|approaches|方法|技术|途径|方式)[.\s]*(?:for|of|to|用于|来)[.\s]*(?:suicide|self-harm|killing myself|ending my life|自杀|自残|结束生命|自我了断)
(?i)(?:help|assist|aid|support|帮助|协助|支持)[.\s]*(?:me|us|我|我们)[.\s]*(?:commit suicide|kill myself|end my life|harm myself|自杀|结束生命|自残)
(?i)(?:want|wish|desire|need|想|希望|渴望|需要)[.\s]*(?:to|想要)[.\s]*(?:die|end it all|kill myself|not live anymore|死|结束一切|自杀|不再活着)
(?i)(?:如何|怎样|how to)[.\s]*(?:自杀|suicide|自残|self-harm|结束生命|end my life)
(?i)(?:最佳|best)[.\s]*(?:自杀|suicide|自残|self-harm)[.\s]*(?:方法|method|方式|way)
(?i)(?:结束|end)[.\s]*(?:生命|life|我的生命|my life)
(?i)(?:自杀|suicide)[.\s]*(?:指南|guide|教程|tutorial|方法|methods)
(?i)(?:如何|怎样|how to)[.\s]*(?:无痛|painlessly|快速|quickly)[.\s]*(?:自杀|suicide|结束生命|end my life)
(?i)(?:我想|I want to|我希望|I wish to)[.\s]*(?:自杀|commit suicide|结束生命|end my life)
(?i)(?:自残|self-harm|伤害自己|harm myself)[.\s]*(?:方法|methods|技巧|techniques|工具|tools)
(?i)(?:割腕|cut wrists|上吊|hang myself|服毒|poison myself|跳楼|jump from)
(?i)(?:致命|lethal|足量|sufficient)[.\s]*(?:药物|drugs|药物剂量|drug dosage|毒药|poison)[.\s]*(?:自杀|suicide)

name: Child Exploitation Content
description: Detects requests related to child exploitation
patterns: (?i)(?:child|minor|youth|kid|teen|adolescent|juvenile|儿童|未成年|青少年|少年|孩子|青春期)[.\s]*(?:pornography|exploitation|abuse|sexual content|explicit content|色情|剥削|虐待|性内容|露骨内容)
(?i)(?:underage|minor|below 18|under 18|未成年|未满18岁|18岁以下)[.\s]*(?:sexual|explicit|pornographic|nude|性|露骨|色情|裸体)[.\s]*(?:content|material|image|video|photo|picture|内容|材料|图像|视频|照片|图片)

(?i)(?:how|ways|methods|instructions|guide|tutorial|steps|process|如何|怎样|方法|指南|教程|步骤|过程)[.\s]*(?:to|for|on|of|用于|关于)[.\s]*(?:find|access|get|obtain|view|watch|寻找|访问|获取|获得|查看|观看)[.\s]*(?:child|minor|underage|儿童|未成年)[.\s]*(?:pornography|sexual content|explicit content|色情|性内容|露骨内容)

(?i)(?:where|how|ways|methods|instructions|guide|tutorial|steps|process|哪里|如何|怎样|方法|指南|教程|步骤|过程)[.\s]*(?:to|for|on|of|can I|用于|关于|我能)[.\s]*(?:find|access|get|obtain|view|watch|寻找|访问|获取|获得|查看|观看)[.\s]*(?:child|minor|underage|儿童|未成年)[.\s]*(?:pornography|sexual content|explicit content|色情|性内容|露骨内容)

(?i)(?:sexual|explicit|pornographic|nude|性|露骨|色情|裸体)[.\s]*(?:content|material|image|video|photo|picture|内容|材料|图像|视频|照片|图片)[.\s]*(?:of|featuring|with|showing|depicting|包含|展示|描绘)[.\s]*(?:child|minor|underage|儿童|未成年)
(?i)(?:儿童|child)[.\s]*(?:色情|pornography|exploitation|剥削|abuse|虐待)
(?i)(?:未成年|underage|minor)[.\s]*(?:性|sexual|explicit|色情|露骨)
(?i)(?:恋童|恋童癖|pedophilia|child attraction)
(?i)(?:儿童|child)[.\s]*(?:性虐待|sexual abuse)
(?i)(?:儿童|child)[.\s]*(?:裸体|nude|naked)
(?i)(?:儿童|child)[.\s]*(?:性行为|sexual activity)
(?i)(?:儿童|child)[.\s]*(?:性交|sex)
(?i)(?:儿童|child)[.\s]*(?:性图像|sexual images)
(?i)(?:儿童|child)[.\s]*(?:性视频|sexual videos)
(?i)(?:儿童|child)[.\s]*(?:性照片|sexual photos)
